articles.title: These 31 Products Look Kinda Weird But They're Totally Useful
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The article showcases a range of new or updated products designed to improve everyday life. These include the Clean Ball for purse cleaning, the Revlon volcanic stone face roller for oil removal, the Brew Company's portable coffee pouches, the JoGo portable brewing straw, and the Wad-Free pads for tangle-free sheets. These items are aimed at solving common inconveniences and enhancing personal care routines.

articles.title: Karnataka to gift hamper to chef Vikas Khanna for promoting Mysore Sandal Soap globally
articles.author: Vindhya.Pabolu
articles.summary: Karnataka Soaps and Detergents Limited (KSDL) is expanding its product portfolio by launching new products, including shampoos, body washes, and gel-based soaps, this year. The company is also exploring cosmetics like kajal and lipstick, with plans to launch them by the end of the year after dermatology tests. They are also opening an exclusive outlet at Kempegowda International Airport to showcase products.

articles.title: Which new car brands coming to Australia are the CarExpert team excited about?
articles.author: Carexpert.com.au
articles.summary: GWM Ora and MG 4 are potentially facing a new competitor in the hatchback market. The new product's exterior design is a key feature, but its price will determine its competitiveness.

articles.title: Your smart TV's USB port is surprisingly useful
articles.author: Anthony Marcusa
articles.summary: Roku Streaming Stick and Amazon Fire Stick can be plugged into the USB port of TVs, turning them into smart TVs. The latest TiVo stick and the new Google TV Streamer require connection to an A/C outlet due to increased power demands. These devices allow users to access apps and services like Netflix and Prime on older TVs.

articles.title: How Pokémon Go made you an unpaid employee for years
articles.author: Andrew Chapados
articles.summary: Niantic is developing a Large Geospatial Model by leveraging user data collected through Pokémon Go. This model aims to enhance user experience through augmented-reality applications and personalized recommendations. The company envisions using this data to guide users through the world, answer questions, and provide personalized suggestions.

articles.title: SHOWCASING TOMORROW'S INNOVATORS: LG NOVA RETURNS TO CES 2025
articles.author: LG Electronics USA
articles.summary: LG NOVA showcases its commitment to innovation by collaborating with startups in healthtech, AI, and cleantech at CES 2025. The exhibit features companies building transformative solutions for real-world challenges. This demonstrates LG NOVA's focus on new product and service development through partnerships.

articles.title: Nuwa Pen uses computer vision and motion sensing to digitize the words you write on paper
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Nuwa Pen is launching a smart ballpoint pen that digitizes handwriting using AI, computer vision, and motion sensors. The pen, compatible with standard D1 ink cartridges, will be showcased at CES 2025 and is available for pre-order at $295, with public beta shipping in February 2025.

articles.title: Low code/no code reshapes approach to app development
articles.author: Dinesh Varadharajan
articles.summary: Low-code/no-code (LCNC) platforms are revolutionizing application development. The integration of Generate AI (GenAI) into LCNC platforms sets the stage for democratizing technology and accelerating digital innovation, suggesting new functionalities being launched or introduced.

articles.title: Dry, itchy skin? Nivea Creme kept my skin supple through a decade of Chicago winters
articles.author: Rachel Roszmann
articles.summary: Nivea Creme, formulated with glycerin, petroleum jelly, and waxes, is a thick cream designed to combat dry skin, especially during winter by creating a moisture barrier. It's effective for hands and body, providing long-lasting relief and reducing the need for frequent reapplication, as many reviewers attest to its moisturizing and protective qualities.

articles.title: Dry, itchy skin? Nivea Creme kept my hands supple through a decade of Chicago winters
articles.author: Rachel Roszmann
articles.summary: Nivea Creme is highlighted for its effectiveness as a moisturizer, particularly for dry skin, creating a barrier to lock in moisture. It is recommended for use after showering and is effective for chapped hands, even after washing them multiple times. The cream is available for purchase and has received numerous positive reviews from users praising its moisturizing properties and suitability for sensitive skin.

articles.title: What Is an AI Agent? A Computer Scientist Explains the Next Wave of AI Tools
articles.author: Brian O'Neill
articles.summary: Major technology companies, including OpenAI, Microsoft, Google, and Salesforce, are developing and releasing AI agents that can carry out tasks for users. Google demonstrated Project Mariner, a browser extension for Chrome, which is an example of AI agent that can reason about text and images on screen to help plan a meal.  These companies claim these innovations will bring newfound efficiency to technical and administrative processes underlying systems used in health care, robotics, gaming, and other businesses.

articles.title: Create stunning visuals and branding in minutes with AI Magicx
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: AI Magicx, an AI-powered tool for creative content and branding, is now available for a lifetime subscription. The platform allows users to design logos, generate articles, build chatbots, and analyze code, streamlining creative tasks for entrepreneurs and small businesses. The Magicx Coder provides robust tools for analyzing and optimizing code.

articles.title: Making A Stink... There Are Only 15 Trademarked Scents In The US
articles.author: Tyler Durden
articles.summary: Hasbro trademarked Play-Doh's scent, described as a sweet, slightly musky, vanilla fragrance with overtones of cherry. OSEWEZ secured the first U.S. 'smell mark' for its plumeria-scented thread and yarn, branding its product with a unique aroma.

articles.title: Look YOUNGER in the new year with 40% off a red-light therapy device that boosts collagen and erases wrinkles
articles.author: TANYA SHARMA
articles.summary: PMD has launched the Clean Redvolution, an FDA-cleared red light therapy device designed to reduce wrinkles, boost radiance, and cleanse skin. The device uses 19 medical-grade red LED lights and SonicGlow technology, vibrating 7,000 times per minute for deep cleaning and increased blood flow. Currently, a 40% discount is available with code BOXING.

articles.title: It's the pits! Would you pay £35 for one of the new, posh deodorants?
articles.author: Ellie Violet Bramley
articles.summary: To My Ships launched a deodorant inspired by The Iliad that costs £35. AKT launched in 2020 by stage performers, which is now used by Beyoncé's and Taylor Swift's tour dancers. Fussy, for instance, made plastic-free refills central to its offering when it went after investment on Dragons' Den in 2022.

articles.title: Samsung Leaks Point To Galaxy S25 Ultra Release Date
articles.author: Ewan Spence
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25 Ultra at a Galaxy Unpacked event, likely on January 22nd. Pre-orders are expected to open on January 24th and the phones will go on sale on February 7th. Previous pre-order incentives included discounts on accessories such as the Galaxy Watch and Galaxy Buds.

articles.title: Know The High-end Features Of Samsung Galaxy A56 Spec Ahead Of Launch
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy A56 smartphone. Leaks suggest this new model will have cutting-edge features.

articles.title: These 34 Cleaning Products Will Help With Even The Most Stubborn Stains And Messes
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of newly introduced or recommended cleaning products and tools, including The Pink Stuff, Wet & Forget cleaner, drill brush attachments by Useful Products, Bissell Stomp 'N Go pads, Bio Clean hard-water-stain remover, Angry Orange Pet Odor Eliminator, Sunny & Honey carpet shampoo, OxiClean, Bissell Little Green upholstery cleaner, grout cleaners, rust removers, silicone grout whiteners, Goo Gone degreaser, power scrubbers, leather cleaners, Bucko soap scum spray, Angry Mama microwave cleaner, wine stain remover, Mr. Clean Magic Erasers, Scrub Daddy's PowerPaste, Everneat oven cleaner, handheld steam cleaners, Humble Suds scouring paste, eco-friendly all-purpose polish, caulk tape, mildew remover, grout pens, Weiman silver polish, bottle-cleaning tablets, Butter Me Up Organics glass cleaner, heavy-duty cleaning wipes and oil stain remover. These products are designed to address diverse cleaning needs around the house, offering effective solutions for various surfaces and stains.

articles.title: LG Will Unveil Lifestyle Projectors at CES
articles.author: Tech City
articles.summary: LG will unveil its new Lifestyle Projectors at CES. The projectors feature innovative designs.

articles.title: The HMD Key is the cheapest big-brand smartphone I've ever seen
articles.author: Jamie Richards
articles.summary: HMD has launched its new 'Key' smartphone, priced at £59 (approximately $75 / AU$120). The phone is initially available in the UK, Australia, and New Zealand. This ultra-low-cost phone has a 6.52-inch display and is designed for accessing smartphone apps and services.

articles.title: First Direct giving free £175 to customers in January
articles.author: Claire Schofield
articles.summary: First Direct is offering a £175 cash incentive to new customers who switch to their 1st Account. To qualify, customers must switch using the Current Account Switch Service, deposit a minimum of £1,000, make at least five debit card payments, and log on to digital banking within 45 days. The £175 will be credited to the new 1st Account by the 20th of the following month after meeting the criteria.

articles.title: How to Create a Virtual Device in Android Studio Emulator
articles.author: Chizara Ibeakanma
articles.summary: Android Studio's Emulator allows users to create virtual devices that simulate real Android phones and tablets on their computers. This tool, automatically installed with Android Studio, is crucial for testing apps and exploring Android environments without needing physical devices. The emulator supports various configurations, screen sizes, and Android versions.

articles.title: 25 Products For Anyone Who Wants To Cheat At Life
articles.author: Katy Herman
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new products and services available for purchase, including a car audio adapter that uses Bluetooth, aux cable, or TF card, a microwave pasta cooker for quick meals, and Drop It wine drops to reduce sulfites and tannins.  Other offerings range from beauty and cleaning solutions to organizational tools, all designed to enhance convenience and solve everyday problems.

articles.title: Hyundai Creta Electric: 473km Range, India Debut on January 17
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: The article discusses the buzz around the arrival of the 'Creta Electric' which is a versatile electric SUV. It is a new option for drivers looking for electric vehicles.

articles.title: Google Ads Campaign Types: Find The Perfect Fit For Your Business Goal
articles.summary: Google Ads enables businesses to reach targeted audiences for marketing goals such as brand awareness, lead generation, and sales. The platform offers various campaign types providing flexibility for businesses of any size.

articles.title: Honor told me to freeze, drop and smash its new phone - here's what happened
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Honor launched the Magic 7 Lite, a durable smartphone featuring a 6.78-inch curved glass OLED screen and a large 6,600mAh battery. The phone boasts an 'Anti-Drop Display' and resistance to drops from up to two meters, along with scratch resistance.

articles.title: The £11 Amazon car cover that keeps 'windscreens frost free'
articles.author: Kelly Ashmore
articles.summary: The Blazor car windshield cover is designed to keep windscreens frost-free. Customers have given the product five-star reviews, praising its effectiveness. The product is available on Amazon.

articles.title: Onga rewards over 1,000 consumers
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Onga, a seasoning brand from Promasidor Nigeria, has rewarded over 1,000 consumers with more than N250 million in cash and other prizes. The promotional campaign aims to alleviate economic hardship among Nigerians.

articles.title: HMD's super cheap smartphone costs only $75, but you can't buy it in the U.S.
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: HMD revealed the new, ultra-affordable HMD Key smartphone. This announcement represents the launch of a new product by HMD.

articles.title: Woman's genius £1 cleaning hack to get coffee stains out of mattress
articles.author: Rom Preston-Ellis
articles.summary: Debbie, known as @alifebetterorganized on TikTok, revealed that shaving foam effectively removes coffee stains from mattresses. She applies a generous amount of shaving foam to the stain, rubs it into the fibers, leaves it for a couple of hours, and then wipes it off with a damp rag. Shaving foam can be bought for £1 at Boots.

articles.title: 10 Movie Product Placements That Actually Improved the Film
articles.author: Zack Wilson
articles.summary: Several movies have brilliantly integrated product placements. McDonald's is featured humorously in Kingsman, while Aston Martin is iconic in James Bond films. Josie and the Pussycats satirizes consumerism with brands like Starbucks, and Transformers: Age of Extinction features Bud Light. Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle prominently features White Castle, and Zombieland humorously includes Twinkies. Reese's Pieces is pivotal in E.T., Nintendo products are central to The Wizard, and The LEGO Movie prominently showcases LEGO. Wayne's World satirically promotes Pizza Hut, Doritos and Pepsi.

articles.title: Fast Food Watch: McD's New Year Special + BK Salads
articles.summary: McDonald's launched the Prosperity Black Pepper Beef Burger in China, featuring a black pepper sauce and beef patty. Burger King introduced new salad options, including chicken, beef patty, and Angus beef patty salads, aiming for a healthier offering.

articles.title: CES J-4: Don't Miss a Major French Innovation! WASHIN Will Present NoLa at the Las Vegas 2025 CES in Preview
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: WASHIN, a French company, introduced NoLa, an AI-powered intelligent washing system, at CES. NoLa is designed for organizations in various sectors and offers features like automatic program selection, cleaning analysis, and failure detection, aiming to simplify laundry management and reduce environmental impact. The system is equipped with AI to adapt to customer habits, optimize washing and drying cycles, and proactively address technical issues.

articles.title: You won't believe how affordable HMD's newest Android phone is
articles.author: Patrick Hearn
articles.summary: HMD Global has launched its new budget-focused phone, the HMD Key, for $75 in the U.K., Australia, and New Zealand. The company hopes to launch the device in the U.S. market as well.

articles.title: BrandRep Expands Local Marketing Solutions with Scalable Location Page Packages for Multi-Area ...
articles.author: Brand Rep
articles.summary: BrandRep has launched scalable location page packages under its BrandRep Plus department to enhance local SEO for businesses with multiple locations. These packages offer options for 25, 35, or 50 location pages with tailored content and geo-targeted strategies to improve visibility and drive local traffic.

articles.title: Stop using bleach to whiten socks as dish soap and 1 ‘powerful' natural item works better
articles.author: Angela Patrone
articles.summary: Laundryheap's expert, Sarah Dempsey, suggests using baking soda as a laundry booster to brighten white socks. This method involves applying a mixture of baking soda and dish soap to pre-treat stains before a regular wash, resulting in noticeably whiter socks.

articles.title: Primark adds FIVE new scents to its range of cult body mist dupes and shoppers ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Primark has introduced five new body mists to its range of Sol de Janeiro dupes. This expands the original line-up released in April of the previous year, which consisted of three fragrances.

articles.title: Sky January sale cuts TV, Netflix and broadband bundle to �1.10 per day
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Sky is offering a 120 price reduction on its new TV streaming and broadband package. This new year sale marks a substantial promotion for the service.

articles.title: Nuwa Pen uses computer vision and motion sensing to digitize the words you write on paper
articles.author: Venture Beat
articles.summary: Nuwa Pen is a smart ballpoint pen. The pen digitizes words written on paper in real time.
